additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water (Aqua), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Cetyl Alcohol, Cetrimonium Chloride, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Glycerin, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Fragrance (Parfum)*, Isopropyl Alcohol, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene*, Citral**, *Natural Fragrance, **Component of Natural Fragrance

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation occurs rinse immediately and discontinue use. For external use only.
